activity_instructions: Read the class assignment. Then write your response on the class discussion board. Remember to take a stand on the proposal and support your position with reasons and examples. Type in the input box. Write 45-70 words. Use your own words where possible.
student_submission: I disagree with the proposal to cut physical education and sports. Physical activity helps students stay healthy, reduces stress, and improves focus in academic subjects. Test scores matter, but so does overall well-being. Taking away movement and teamwork opportunities will harm students more than help them. Schools should prepare students for life—not just exams. Balance is key to a good education.

activity_instructions: You're asked to prepare the script for the opening of a presentation about your company. Write the script based on the email. Include a self-introduction, hook and outline. Write 80–175 words.
student_submission:
Hi,

As you know, we're planning a presentation to introduce our company to potential clients. Can you please prepare a script for the presentation?

You can start with just the opening for now. The presentation will be about how our company started, the changes that have occurred in the past few years, and our plans for the future. Where possible, try to include interesting facts about the company. For example, most people know us as a finance company, but a lot of people don't know that we actually started out in the travel industry. And remember to introduce yourself, since there will be a lot of unfamiliar faces in the audience.

activity_instructions: Listen to the two forecasts – a general one and a shipping forecast. What are the differences between them? Write 30-50 words. Type in the input box.
student_submission: A general weather forecast provides a broad overview of weather conditions for a region, often including temperature, precipitation, and wind patterns. A shipping forecast, on the other hand, is more specific, detailing sea conditions, wind speed, visibility, and pressure, tailored to mariners for safe navigation.

activity_instructions: You are a life coach. It's your job to advise people on their lifestyle choices. You're in a consultation with a new client, Pete. Listen to him describe his lifestyle and take notes.
student_submission:
Notes on Pete’s Lifestyle:

Pete faces several challenges in his lifestyle that are negatively affecting his health and well-being. He smokes and is constantly stressed due to work, where he often works long hours. This leaves him feeling tired and lacking energy. He spends most of his time sitting in front of a computer, which has caused back pain due to an uncomfortable chair.

Additionally, Pete drinks too much coffee and does not get enough sleep, which worsens his fatigue. He also watches too much TV and eats a lot of junk food, contributing to his overweight condition.

These habits indicate the need for significant changes to improve his overall health and quality of life.

activity_instructions: Your boss has asked you to write a formal report recommending a training company. You've chosen Skills Pro. Use your notes to write up the report. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
**Recommendation Report: Training Company Selection**

After evaluating two potential training companies, TrainQuick and Skills Pro, I recommend selecting **Skills Pro** for our upcoming training needs.

Although **TrainQuick** offers a more affordable and flexible solution, it has several drawbacks. Notably, employees in other branches have reported low usage of its services, and there is dissatisfaction when employees from different branches are mixed in the same classes. These factors suggest that TrainQuick may not be the best fit for our team dynamics.

On the other hand, **Skills Pro** may be more expensive, but it offers a higher quality of training. Despite the challenging course content, participants who complete the program tend to do so successfully. This indicates that the training provided is rigorous, ensuring employees gain a solid understanding of the material. Furthermore, Skills Pro plans to expand their courses, which could provide additional benefits in the future.

Considering the importance of high-quality training, I believe **Skills Pro**'s reputation for effective courses justifies the additional cost, making it the preferable option for our team.

activity_instructions: Write a letter to apologize to someone for something you did recently. If you prefer, you can make something up. Type in the input box. Write 80-120 words. Use your own words where possible.
student_submission:
Dear Sam,

I hope you're doing well. I want to sincerely apologize for missing your birthday dinner last Friday. I know how important that evening was to you, and I feel terrible for not letting you know earlier that I couldn’t make it. Something unexpected came up at work, and I completely lost track of time. I understand if you're upset, and I truly regret not being there to celebrate with you. Please let me make it up to you — maybe we can go out for lunch this week? Again, I'm really sorry for letting you down.

Best regards,

activity_instructions: Write a criticism of a celebrity. It can be a particular celebrity or the whole idea of celebrity in general. Use some of the language you have learned for criticizing in this lesson. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
uccess is not something that happens by chance—it is the result of consistent effort, focus, and discipline. While talent and intelligence can open doors, discipline is what keeps those doors open. Discipline means having the ability to stay committed to your goals even when motivation fades. It’s waking up early to study, even when you feel tired. It’s choosing long-term rewards over short-term pleasures. Many successful people will tell you that their achievements didn’t come from moments of inspiration alone, but from small, disciplined actions repeated every single day.

Discipline also teaches you resilience. Life will present challenges, setbacks, and failures, but those who remain disciplined are better prepared to face them. They don’t give up after one failure—they learn from it, adjust their path, and keep moving forward. Ultimately, success is built not on luck, but on steady effort. With discipline, anything becomes possible.

activity_instructions: Look at your notes then write to your manager, Samantha. Describe what will be in your speech. Use a soft but confident tone. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Opening:

We are pleased to announce the renewal of our partnership with Crum. This achievement is a testament to our ongoing commitment to excellence. As an added bonus, Crum has praised our dedication to maintaining high-quality standards.

Body:

However, it is important to acknowledge that three months ago, we encountered some unresolved defects that posed significant challenges. In addition to these major issues, there were also minor technical problems that needed attention. To address these concerns, we implemented several key solutions. Firstly, we changed our update delivery process to ensure more timely and efficient updates. Secondly, we enhanced our Quality Assurance (QA) processes to better identify and resolve defects before they impact our customers.

Closing:

Looking ahead, we are committed to providing further support to prevent similar problems from arising in the future. Our goal is to maintain strong relationships with our customers by continuously improving our processes and delivering high-quality products and services. We believe that these efforts will help us avoid potential issues and ensure customer satisfaction.

activity_instructions: Read Ken's email and then email Josh and Ken a third option. Use your imagination. You can create any facts about your city that will support your proposal. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
I’ve been thinking about the challenges we’re facing, and I believe there might be a middle ground between staying where we are and moving to a new model. What if we consider expanding our business by opening a smaller satellite location in an up-and-coming part of town?

I’ve heard that the Riverdale district, just a few miles from downtown, is becoming a hotspot for young professionals and small businesses. Rent is about 20% lower than what we’re paying now, and the area is seeing a lot of new development. We could keep our downtown location for in-person fittings and personal consultations while opening a smaller, more cost-effective store in Riverdale to showcase our clothing, allowing for a blend of both models.

This way, we’d save on rent but still maintain the showroom and the customer experience that has helped us build our loyal following. Plus, we could tap into a fresh market of young, style-conscious professionals in Riverdale who may not have visited our downtown store.

I think it’s a good compromise and could give us a way forward without the drastic change. What do you think?

Please, everyone must wear a hard hat and boots. 
Also, please make sure that only authorized persons are allowed to circulate in the construction area.
If there is danger of collapse, please make sure to evacuate the endangered area and avoid the movement of people in the vicinity.

In case of emergency, contact the security system to report the detected irregularity.
It is important to respect these rules to ensure everyone's safety.

activity_instructions: Write a paragraph describing how robots are being used in your country. How do you feel about them? In what ways will they positively and negatively affect society? Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission: In my country, robots are increasingly being integrated into various sectors, including manufacturing, healthcare, and agriculture. In manufacturing, they enhance productivity by performing repetitive tasks with precision, leading to faster production times and reduced labor costs. In healthcare, robots assist in surgeries and patient care, improving outcomes and allowing medical professionals to focus on more complex tasks. In agriculture, drones and automated machinery help optimize crop management and harvesting processes. While I feel optimistic about the advancements robots bring, I also recognize potential downsides. On the positive side, robots can lead to increased efficiency, lower costs, and improved safety in hazardous environments. However, the rise of automation raises concerns about job displacement and the widening skills gap, as many workers may find it challenging to adapt to new technologies. Additionally, reliance on robots could lead to ethical dilemmas regarding decision-making in critical areas like healthcare. Overall, while robots have the potential to significantly benefit society, it is crucial to address the challenges they pose to ensure a balanced and equitable transition.

Statement about White Space Associates share prices
We are releasing this public statement to refute the recent slanderous rumors about White Spaces Associates share prices. It has been falsely reported in the press that share prices of our company have dropped.
This absurd claim is entirely fabricated, and we believe it originated in the press just as construction for Mishima Corporation's new HQ building is starting. It is important to mention that recently White Space beat 20 other top agencies to get the contract from Mishima, having our design approved by Mr. Mishima himself. Additionally, our company profits are coming from consecutives rises in the past three years and we have already got three big contracts lined up in the coming years also.
These extremely irresponsible reports will be the focus of an investigation by White Space's legal team. It is for the sake of our clients that our lawyers will be taking swift action to seek compensation and an apology from those responsible for these absurd claims.

activity_instructions: Use the information in the notes to write an informative text about NAFTA, or write about a trade agreement your country is a part of. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
The North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) is a significant trade pact that includes the United States, Canada, and Mexico. Implemented in January 1994 after extensive negotiations, NAFTA aimed to enhance trade relations by reducing or eliminating customs duties among its member states. This agreement has had a notable impact on various sectors, particularly agriculture. A prominent example is the increased flow of Mexican fruits and vegetables into the United States, which has contributed to a more diverse and abundant food supply.

NAFTA’s influence on the economies of its member countries is a mix of positive and negative outcomes. On the positive side, it has encouraged the expansion of trade and investment, leading to economic growth and job creation. Consumers have benefited from a wider range of goods at lower prices. However, some industries have faced challenges, such as job losses in certain manufacturing sectors due to increased competition.

Despite these challenges, the overall consensus is that NAFTA has been beneficial for all three countries. It has strengthened economic ties and increased cooperation, fostering a more integrated North American market. The agreement has laid the groundwork for future trade discussions and reforms, aiming to balance the diverse needs of its member states.

activity_instructions: Write a description, introducing the new bird species, comparing its appearance and habitat to that of the American robin, and classification using the formal zoological classification system. For the classification, suggest a name for the new species and say why it’s suitable. Use the email as reference.
student_submission:
A new bird species closely related to the American robin has been discovered following DNA testing of various flocks previously thought to be robins. This new species shows significant differences in both appearance and behavior while still inhabiting similar terrains.
Appearance: The new species is slightly smaller than the American robin and has a larger bill. The male's coloring is rustier and less red compared to the vibrant red breast of the American robin.
Habitat: This species shares the same general habitat as the American robin but differs in its migratory patterns. Unlike the American robin, which winters in southern regions, this new species remains in Canada year-round.
Classification:
•	Kingdom: Animal
•	Phylum: Chordate
•	Class: Bird
•	Order: Passeriformes
•	Family: Turdidae
•	Genus: Turdus
•	Species: Turdus canadensis (proposed name)
The name Turdus canadensis is suggested to reflect its Canadian habitat and distinguish it from the more migratory American robin (Turdus migratorius). This name emphasizes its geographic range and subtle differences from its close relative.

activity_instructions: A website has invited you to write your opinion on the topic of corporate social responsibility. Read the postings before you begin. Remember the structure you've learned on how to construct an argument. Write 200-250 words.
student_submission:
Corporate social responsibility (CSR) is an important topic in today's business world. The debate is about how companies should care about society's welfare as well as making profits, or if they should focus only on making money for their shareholders. 

Supporters of CSR say that companies have a big impact on the communities where they operate. By adopting sustainable practices and offering fair benefits to employees, companies not only secure their future but also help society. For example, companies with strong CSR initiatives often enjoy greater customer loyalty, which leads to better financial performance. This relationship between busines and society shows the importance of CSR in creating a positive corporate image.

However, critics of CSR argue that the main responsibility of a business is to its shareholders. They say that the resources spent on CSR could be better used in activities that directly increase profits. Additionally, some believe that CSR initiatives are often superficial, serving more as marketing tools than genuine efforts to make a difference. 

Despite these criticisms, the benefits of CSR cannot be ignored. While it is true that businesses must remain profitable, integrating CSR into their core strateges can lead to sustainable growth. Companies that ignore social expectations risk damaging their reputation and losing consumer trust. Moreover, CSR initiatives can drive innovation and open new markets, benefiting both the company and society.

activity_instructions: Write a letter to apologize to someone for something you did recently. If you prefer, you can make something up. Type in the input box. Write 80-120 words. Use your own words where possible.
student_submission:
**Example Letter:**  

Dear Sarah,  

I want to sincerely apologize for missing your birthday dinner last Friday. I completely lost track of time, and I realize how much effort you put into organizing the evening. It was inconsiderate of me, and I regret letting you down on such a special occasion.  

Moving forward, I’ll make sure to set reminders and prioritize important events like this. Please let me know if there’s a way I can make it up to you. I value our friendship deeply and hope you can forgive me.  

Warm regards,  
Emily

activity_instructions: Listen to the song 'Home Improvement' by Josh Woodward. Write an email or social post describing the song. What do you think of the melody, lyrics and singer's voice? Do you recommend the song? Type in the input box. Write 100-120 words. Use your own words where possible.
student_submission: I recently listened to "Home Improvement" by Josh Woodward, and it's a beautifully crafted song. The melody is light and engaging, with a folk-like quality that gives the track an easygoing, yet reflective feel. Woodward's voice is warm and sincere, adding an emotional depth to the lyrics. The song tells a relatable story of life's imperfections and the desire to make things better, both literally and metaphorically. It’s introspective but still approachable, with a soft, soothing rhythm. If you're a fan of thoughtful songwriting and melodic folk music, I highly recommend giving this one a listen. It’s the perfect soundtrack for quiet moments of reflection.

activity_instructions: Your manager wants you to write a formal email to the rest of the team about the priorities. Use the notes to help you. Remember to edit your email before sending it. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Subject: Team priorities - Key focus areas

Dear Team,
I hope you’re all doing well. I want to take a moment to clarify our current priorities and keep everyone aligned.

Our top priority is the US client design work.
This project is essential, not only because of its scale, but also because a successful outcome could lead to future collaborations. While progress has been a bit slow, it’s still on track, and I appreciate everyone’s continued effort. Please keep up with the good work, and don’t hesitate to reach out if you need support.

Another important area is recruitment.
As two members will be leaving in Q2, we need to begin finding suitable replacements as soon as possible. If you know any qualified candidates or have referrals, please let me know directly. Your input is always appreciated.

Lastly, regarding the marketing media reorganization: this is not a current priority.
The project is complex and requires significant time and resources. Since we are no longer using much of the old media, this initiative is on hold until further notice.

Thanks again for your dedication.

Best regards,
Boss

activity_instructions: Write a summary of the text in no more than 100 words. Compare your text with the model. This is a non-graded activity.
student_submission:
Drugs can produce harmful effects when manufactured or taken improperly, therefore drug development and availability is under strict government control in most countries.

In the United States, the FDA determines how drugs are produced and how they are sold Drugs that can be sold over the counter (OTC), without a prescription from a physician, are called proprietary drugs. 

The U.S. government and its regulatory agencies continually monitor the development and use of all drugs sold in the United States to ensure that the American public has access only to drugs that are safe and effective.

activity_instructions: Apply the language you've learned in this lesson to a new topic: language learning. Write about issues and challenges that language students often face. Ask yourself guiding questions to help organize the writing. Type in the input box. Write 150-250 words.
student_submission: Language students usually face one big challenge which is to articulate thoughts in to words. I got this opportunity to learn this being a part of corporate structure but not everyone get a same opportunity. What I have learnt though my journey is if you are willing to learn then no one can stop you form gaining required knowledge. During my course I learned how to use different phrases. How to be an effective listener. Other issues such as linguistic challenges like Grammar and Syntax, pronunciation, vocabulary acquisition and retention, idiomatic expressions and cultural nuances. Also maintaining the motivation throughout the language learning process can be difficult, especially when progress feels slow or when facing setbacks. Feeling overwhelmed by the complexities of the language or comparing themselves to native speakers.

activity_instructions: Read Ken's email and then email Josh and Ken a third option. Use your imagination. You can create any facts about your city that will support your proposal. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Hi Josh,

We need to decide on the future of our business soon. The landlord has just notified me that next month's rent will increase by 25%, raising it to $4,500 a month. That’s an additional $54,000 annually, which will significantly impact our profits.

 You prefer to stay put despite the higher rent, arguing that our location in a trendy district and downtown accessibility are key benefits. However, our clothing sales are not growing as fast as our expenses, and with the rapid development in Centerville.

I’ve been leaning towards a different approach—relocating to the south end of town for production and implementing a system to meet clients at their offices or schools for fittings. This would also involve upgrading our website to allow online measurement submissions and clothing selection. This shift could lead to substantial cost savings, but we'd lose the physical showroom that enables customers to experience our products firsthand and receive personalized service.

Another idea we might consider is a hybrid model. We could negotiate a short-term lease in a more affordable location while we test our new system for fittings and online sales. This would allow us to assess the viability of this approach without committing fully to the higher rent or completely abandoning our current setup. It would also give us time to gather customer feedback and make adjustments as needed.

Let’s discuss this possibility and explore it further. We definitely need to make a choice soon

activity_instructions: Read Ken's email and then email Josh and Ken a third option. Use your imagination. You can create any facts about your city that will support your proposal. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Hi Josh and Ken
I have read the previous emails and all the options are valid and  I would like to provide a third option to take into account.
In this option, instead of moving to a permanent location on the south end of town, let's consider using pop-up showrooms and collaboration spaces throughout Centerville. This allows us to engage with different communities and demographics without committing to a long-term lease. We can organize temporary showrooms in various parts of the city on a rotating schedule. This could be installed in high-traffic areas such as shopping malls, community centers, or even within other businesses that complement your product (for example, a high-end men's grooming store or the lobby of a boutique hotel). It helps us have greater visibility and allows us to test different markets without a significant initial investment.
This third option takes advantage of flexibility and strategic partnerships, allowing us to maintain a physical presence that adapts to changing market conditions while keeping costs under control. We could take this into account and talk about it.
We´ll keep in touch with this
Thanks!
Silvina

activity_instructions: Listen to the radiotelephony messages and write down the letters and numbers.
student_submission:
Car Design Comparison Report

After reviewing the two car designs, Design A stands out for its sleek, modern look and fuel efficiency, making it ideal for eco-conscious drivers. It includes advanced safety features, a digital dashboard, and a lightweight frame, which improves performance and lowers emissions. Design B, while more traditional, offers greater interior space and a lower production cost, appealing to families and budget-conscious buyers.

Despite the cost advantage of Design B, I strongly recommend we move forward with Design A. It aligns better with current customer preferences for environmentally friendly and tech-forward vehicles. Industry trends show increasing demand for innovation and sustainability—qualities Design A delivers. Choosing Design A positions our company as a forward-thinking leader ready to meet the needs of the next generation of drivers.

Let’s lead with innovation and set a new standard for excellence. Design A is the future.

activity_instructions: After the consultation, you write Pete a summary of his bad lifestyle habits and how to change them. Write the email below, including language of cause, effect, advice and describing benefits. Use the notes to help you. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Pete, it's essential to approach your health holistically. Start by seeking professional help to quit smoking, like a program or consulting a therapist. 
To deal with work stress, set limits and try with relaxation techniques such as deep breathing and meditation exercises. 
Improve your work environment with an ergonomic chair to reduce your back pain, and take regular breaks to strech your body.
Gradually reduce your coffee cups and replace them with herbal teas. 
Establish a relaxing bedtime routine to enhance your sleep quality, and assure that your sleep environment is calm and quiet. 
Select nutritious meals instead of fast food, eat more fruits and vegetables. 
Incorporate some physical activity in your daily life like walking or light exercises. 
Finally, limit your screen time and engage in outdoor activities or hobbies.
These tips will lead you to a healthier and more balanced lifestyle. And what is more important, you will feel proud of having achieved it!

activity_instructions: Now write up the research proposal. Use the notes to help you. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Research Proposal: Student Attitudes Toward Traditional vs. Online Learning

Client: University
Project Title: First-Year Student Attitudes Toward Traditional and Online Learning Environments

Overview:
This research project aims to explore and compare the attitudes of first-year university students—both mature students and school leavers—toward traditional classroom settings and online learning environments. The focus will be on understanding student preferences, engagement, and expectations in each mode of learning.

Objectives:
The primary objective is to gather qualitative insights into whether students would be willing to attend virtual classes during vacation periods, how frequently they would be willing to do so, and their motivations behind such choices.

Methodology:
The study will use qualitative methods, including focus groups and in-depth interviews with a diverse sample of first-year students. These sessions will be designed to encourage open discussion around learning experiences, convenience, effectiveness, and overall attitudes toward online vs. traditional formats.

Timeline:
The project will commence in the fall and run for three months.

Purpose:
Findings will help the university assess the feasibility and appeal of developing a virtual classroom platform.

activity_instructions: Your boss has asked you to write a formal report recommending a training company. You've chosen Skills Pro. Use your notes to write up the report. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Research Summary on Training Providers
The aim of this report is to summarize my research into the most suitable training provider to meet our organization's needs for professional development. The two companies under consideration are TrainQuick, known for its affordability and flexibility, and Skills Pro, which offers higher-quality, though more expensive, programs.

TrainQuick is cost-effective and adaptable, but feedback from employees suggests it may not be the ideal choice. One recurring issue is dissatisfaction with mixed-group classes, where our staff are placed alongside employees from other branches. Additionally, it has not been widely adopted in other parts of the organization, which raises concerns about its overall effectiveness.

Skills Pro, while more expensive, stands out for its robust course content and high completion rates. Despite the challenging nature of the material, participants often finish successfully, demonstrating its value. Moreover, the company plans to expand its course offerings, reflecting a commitment to continuous improvement.

Given the importance of quality training to our long-term success, Skills Pro is the stronger choice, despite its higher cost. Investing in a premium program will yield better outcomes and ensure that our employees receive impactful and engaging training. I recommend proceeding with Skills Pro and initiating discussions to finalize the partnership.

By outfitting a stylish van with samples and tailoring equipment, you can bring the personalized showroom experience directly to your customers. This innovative approach allows you to offer convenience and flexibility, catering to busy clients who appreciate personalized service at their doorstep.

activity_instructions:
Write about a memorable movie, or one you recently saw.

Give facts and opinions about it. Who starred in the movie? Who directed it? What was it about?

Follow the structure you have studied.
student_submission:
-

**Title of the Movie**: The Irishman

**Genre**: Drama, Crime

**Release Date**: 2019

**Cast**: The film features a stellar cast, including Robert De Niro as Frank Sheeran, Al Pacino as Jimmy Hoffa, and Joe Pesci as Russell Bufalino. The performances by these legendary actors are one of the highlights of the film.

**Director**: Martin Scorsese, known for his mastery in telling stories about the mafia and complex dramas.

**Location**: The film was shot in various cities across the USA, primarily in iconic locations in New York and Pennsylvania, which adds to the authenticity of the narrative.

**Story**: "The Irishman" follows the life of Frank Sheeran, a World War II veteran who becomes a hitman for the mafia. Throughout the film, Frank reflects on his experiences and his involvement with prominent figures in organized crime, especially his relationship with union leader Jimmy Hoffa. The story explores themes of loyalty, betrayal, and regret as Frank narrates his memories of a life marked by violence and corruption.

**Best Things About the Movie**:
- Martin Scorsese's direction is exceptional, with a unique touch that keeps the viewer engaged even at a slower pace.
- The performances are powerful; De Niro, Pacino, and Pesci deliver memorable portrayals that capture the complexity of their characters.
- The screenplay written by Steven Zaillian is engaging and well-structured, providing a rich narrative filled with historical details.
- The cinematography is impressive, with an aesthetic that pays homage to classic mafia films.

**Things I Didn't Like**:
- The pacing of the film can be slow at times, which may discourage viewers who prefer more dynamic narratives.
- The runtime of over three hours can be challenging for some viewers, requiring patience to follow the entire story.

**Recommendation**: Yes, I recommend "The Irishman," especially for fans of historical dramas and mafia films. It is a masterpiece that offers a deep insight into life within organized crime and the consequences of choices made throughout one's life. It is ideal for those who appreciate richly nuanced stories and exceptional performances.

activity_instructions: You're reading an online article about trends in the travel industry and possible future developments. You think your colleagues would be interested in it and want to send them the link. Write them an email summarizing the three major areas of the article to interest them enough to read it. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Positive thinking is more than just a mindset—it is a powerful tool that can transform your entire life. When you focus on the good, even in difficult situations, you train your mind to see opportunities instead of obstacles. This simple shift in perspective can improve your mood, relationships, health, and success.

People who practice positive thinking are often more resilient. They bounce back from failure faster and learn from their mistakes. They approach challenges with confidence and believe in their ability to grow and improve. This optimism creates a sense of hope that helps them keep moving forward, even when times are tough.

Positive thinking also affects physical health. Studies show that people with a positive outlook are less likely to suffer from stress-related illnesses. They often sleep better, have lower blood pressure, and enjoy better overall well-being.

Of course, staying positive doesn’t mean ignoring reality or pretending that everything is perfect. It means choosing to face life with courage and faith, trusting that things can get better. It involves gratitude, self-compassion, and surrounding yourself with supportive people.

You can develop positive thinking by practicing daily affirmations, setting realistic goals, and focusing on what you can control. Even small habits like smiling more or writing down things you're thankful for can make a big difference.

In a world full of negativity and pressure, choosing positivity is a powerful act. It can change your life and inspire those around you. So, no matter where you are in your journey, remember: your thoughts have power. Choose them wisely, and you can create a brighter future—one positive step at a time.

activity_instructions: You need to address the concerns of your company's shareholders. Write an email to reassure them. Read your notes first. Type in the input box. Write 150–250 words.
student_submission:
Subject: Addressing Shareholders' Concerns and Reaffirming Stability

Dear Shareholders,

I hope this message finds you well. We have recently become aware of concerns regarding the stability of Future Foundations Construction Company and rumors about our share prices. We want to address these concerns directly and provide clarity.

First and foremost, we want to stress our firm position: Future Foundations Construction Company is committed to maintaining stability in the market. The rumors about our share prices going down and wiping out investments are completely unfounded.

It is true that our share value experienced a drop two months ago. This was directly related to the resignation of our former CEO, Greg Johnson. However, since then, we have welcomed our new CEO, Harry Levi, who is well-known and highly respected in the industry. Under his leadership, our share value has not only recovered but has also quickly increased to a historic high.

To ensure continued stability in this unstable market, we have secured three significant contracts for the coming three years, guaranteeing substantial profits. This achievement underscores our solid foundation and forward-looking strategy.

We want to take this opportunity to thank you, our valued shareholders, for your loyalty and support. We are confident about the company's bright future and remain committed to delivering sustained growth and stability.

As part of our ongoing commitment to transparency and reassurance, we will soon share Future Foundations' comprehensive five-year roadmap with you.

Thank you once again for your trust and confidence in Future Foundations Construction Company.

Best regards,

activity_instructions: Your teacher has asked you to write a short text about the parts of an airplane. Explain what each of the different parts are for, including the fuselage, wings, tail and engines. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
An airplane is a complex machine made up of several important parts, each with a specific function to ensure safe and efficient flight. The fuselage is the central part of the airplane, where the cockpit, passengers, and cargo are located. It serves as the main structure and connects all the other parts.

The wings are essential for flight. They produce the lift needed to keep the airplane in the air. When air passes over and under the wings, the difference in pressure causes the airplane to rise.

The tail, also called the empennage, helps maintain the stability of the airplane during flight. It is made up of vertical and horizontal surfaces that control direction (movements to the sides and up or down).

The engines are responsible for generating the force called thrust, which propels the airplane forward. They can be located under the wings or at the rear of the fuselage, depending on the type of aircraft.

Each of these parts works together to ensure that the airplane can take off, fly, maneuver, and land safely. Knowing its functions helps you understand how flight is possible, without any errors.

activity_instructions: Now write up the research proposal. Use the notes to help you. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
************* DONT DO FEEDBACK*************


Work and Leisure Patterns in the USA

This proposal is a result of a government decision to collect information regarding work and leisure patterns in the general population. The research will be conducted on behalf of the U.S. Office of Sport and Leisure.

This research proposal will outline a plan to conduct quantitative research into contemporary leisure trends, work hours and social demands. Surveys and interviews will be conducted in order to evaluate the amount of time people spend engaged in work and leisure activities. Research of this size and scope is both necessary and timely since no similar work has been conducted in many years.

The research will analyze trends in leisure time over recent decades in the United States to determine whether the average amount of leisure time is changing. The aim of this research is to answer the following questions:

-    Does the current generation work longer hours than the previous generation?
-    How much time do people engage in leisure activities, and how do they spend their leisure time?

Hey Leon,
So sorry to hear you're having such a rough time. It sounds like you're dealing with a lot right now, so it's good you reached out.
First, with your job, it's completely understandable to feel stressed with unsupportive management.  It's tough when your efforts aren't acknowledged. Before you make any big decisions, maybe try documenting specific instances where you excelled and the lack of recognition.  Sometimes having concrete examples helps you see the situation more clearly, and it might be useful if you decide to discuss your concerns with HR or look for other opportunities.  Don't underestimate the impact of a toxic work environment on your well-being.
As for Tia, relationships can be really complicated. It's sad when things don't work out, especially when you had hopes.  Allow yourself time to grieve and process the situation.  Try to focus on self-care and doing things you enjoy. Heartbreak is never easy, but it does get better.  Remember, you are worthy of love and happiness.

Take care,

activity_instructions: You are a medical resident who writes a blog about the health industry. One of your readers has asked you a question. Read the question, then write a suitable answer. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Hello,

Thank you for your thoughtful questions. Being a doctor is both challenging and immensely rewarding. The journey involves years of study and rigorous clinical training, which can be demanding both mentally and physically. As an intern, resident, or fellow, you do receive a stipend, but many of us feel that while it helps cover basic living expenses, it may not fully compensate for the long hours and significant responsibilities you take on.

There are a variety of career paths in medicine. You might choose primary care, which offers the chance to build lasting relationships with patients, or opt for a specialty such as surgery, cardiology, or oncology, where you focus on a specific area of interest. Working in a clinic or hospital means that no two days are the same—each shift brings new challenges, from emergency situations to routine patient care. Despite the hard work and occasional stress, the opportunity to improve patients’ lives makes it all worthwhile.

I encourage you to shadow professionals and seek firsthand experiences to see if this career aligns with your passion. Best of luck on your journey!

activity_instructions: Listen to the conversation again.  List the steps for detaining a suspect in the order the training officer mentions them.
student_submission:
The Expected Effect of Sun Valley Dam on Local Sloth Species

Abstract
?

Methodology
Advanced PC simulation created to test how dam construction and completion will relate to overall sloth livelihood.

Findings
Simulation run repeatedly to determine effect of each variable (e.g. area of habitat, food variety, etc.) found that loss of habitat and reduction of food variety will be the main factors caused by the construction of the dam.

Conclusion
Two factors caused by dam construction (loss of habitat and reduction of food variety) will relate most to population decline.

Recommendation
Relocate local sloth species to neighbouring Corona Valley prior to dam construction to prevent ecological cataclysm and perhaps even extinction.

References
“West Indian Sloths and Two-Toed Tree Sloths: Megalonychidae”, Grzimek's Student Animal Life Resource, January 1, 2005.

activity_instructions: Listen to the conversation again.  List the steps for detaining a suspect in the order the training officer mentions them.
student_submission:
Here are the steps for detaining a suspect in the order mentioned by the training officer:

Approach the suspect calmly and identify yourself clearly as a law enforcement officer.

Inform the suspect that they are being detained and explain the reason for the detention.

Ask the suspect to keep their hands visible at all times.

Search the suspect for any weapons or dangerous items carefully and safely.

Use handcuffs or restraints if necessary, following proper safety procedures.

Read the suspect their rights if applicable.

Escort the suspect to a secure location or transport vehicle.

Complete any necessary paperwork or documentation related to the detention.

activity_instructions: You are a journalist for a financial magazine. You've been asked by your editor to write a report on the performance of the Hang Seng (HSI) stock market index. You have some notes and a graph as your guide. Write an article of 150-200 words, making it as accurate and interesting as possible.
student_submission:

activity_instructions: Read the email from your manager. Then respond with an email that has several ideas to help her solve the budget problem. Type in the input box. Write between 80 and 100 words. Use your own words where possible.
student_submission:
Hi.
Addressing a budget crisis requires strategic planning to reduce costs while maintaining efficiency. Start by automating repetitive tasks and optimizing workflows to save time and money. Implement a hiring freeze and consider cross-training staff to cover multiple roles. Renegotiate vendor contracts, switch to cheaper suppliers, or adopt just-in-time inventory management. Cancel unused subscriptions, migrate to open-source tools, and optimize cloud services. Minimize travel, adopt a paperless policy, and reduce energy waste. Engage employee for cost-saving ideas, sell underutilized assets, and explore new revenue streams to balance the budget.
Thanks!
T Guhambika.

activity_instructions: Read an email from your friend and give advice on some stressful problems he is having. Type in the input box. Write 100-200 words.
student_submission:
Hi,

Thanks for opening up—it means a lot that you trust me. I’m really sorry to hear that you’ve been feeling overwhelmed lately. It sounds like you’re juggling a lot right now, and that can be exhausting.

One thing that might help is breaking things down into smaller, more manageable steps. Focus on what you can control, and try not to take everything on at once. Also, don’t be afraid to lean on others—friends, family, or even a counselor. You don’t have to go through this alone.

Make sure to carve out a little time just for you, even if it’s just 10 minutes a day. Sometimes, a short walk or a quiet moment can make a big difference.

You’ve gotten through tough times before, and I believe in your strength to do it again. I’m here if you ever need to talk more.

Take care,
Subhajyoti

student_submission: If you are an investor looking for opportunities in the stock market, this information might interest you. It is about the Hong Kong’s stock index – the Hang Seng Index (HSI). This index has been reflecting the current trend of the climbing market after investments from Mainland China six months ago, when the index was around 20,956 points. Since then, Properties and Utilities sub-indices have risen dramatically due to growth from China. Considering the last six months, HSI has risen 31% reaching 27,499 points last week. activity_instructions: You see a niche in the hotel market and decide to write a business proposal for investors. Write the **strategic summary** and **risk assessment** sections of the proposal using the notes. Write 140–200 words.
student_submission:
Strategic Summary

Zen will be a boutique hotel that combines luxury accommodations with a spa, health, and fitness center, catering to the growing demand for wellness-focused weekend getaways. According to market research from AccomData Group, there is a rising trend in consumers seeking relaxing resorts and prioritizing healthy lifestyles. Additionally, surveys reveal dissatisfaction with the cuisine offered at most fitness centers. Zen will address this gap by offering a healthy, gourmet menu crafted by top chefs from renowned restaurants.

The hotel will feature fully equipped gyms, swimming pools, and trained instructors to provide a premium fitness experience. Construction is estimated to take two years, with a return on investment expected in the second year after opening. Projected annual profits after the second year are $1 million, with the investment recouped within four years of opening and profits starting in year five.

Risk Assessment

The financial projections account for potential economic downturns. If the economy remains stable, the investment recovery period and profit realization could be accelerated. To ensure strong market entry, an intensive media campaign will be executed by Kudos Advertising Agency, maximizing visibility and customer engagement. This strategy minimizes risks and positions Zen for long-term success.

activity_instructions: Write a summary of a negotiation. It could be something you did at work, something you purchased on your own, or a summary of what happened in the movies in this unit. What was the preliminary offer? What happened during the negotiations? What was the final deal? Type in the input box. Write 100-150 words. This activity is non-graded.
student_submission:
Negotiation Summary

Last year, I negotiated the purchase of a used car. The preliminary offer from the seller was $10,000, but I felt it was too high considering the car's mileage and condition. During the negotiation, I pointed out a few minor issues and compared prices with similar cars in the market. The seller was initially firm, but after some discussion, he agreed to lower the price. We finally settled on $9,000. I also asked him to include a new set of tires in the deal, which he accepted. In the end, both sides were satisfied with the outcome. I learned that being respectful but firm, and doing your research beforehand, can really help during a negotiation.

activity_instructions: Write a summary of a negotiation. It could be something you did at work, something you purchased on your own, or a summary of what happened in the movies in this unit. student_submission: I recently participated in a negotiation to purchase a new cell phone. The salesperson's initial offer was R$2,500.00, but I thought the price was high, so I started negotiating. I argued that the model was priced well above the market price and mentioned some competitors that offered a lower price with similar benefits. During the conversation, the salesperson was flexible and proposed a 10% discount, in addition to including an accessory as a gift. However, I suggested that the discount be increased to 15%, claiming that I could buy it elsewhere for an even better price. After a few counteroffers, we reached an agreement of a 12% discount and the gift, which was satisfactory for both parties. activity_instructions: Now prepare the content for an informative web page about counterfeit goods. Be sure to keep the following points in mind: Types of counterfeit goods, the effect of counterfeiting on society, the signs of a fake, what to do if you discover fake goods.  Write 250-300 words.
student_submission:
How to find counterfeit goods

Here is the way to find counterfeit goods when you do shopping.
Be aware of those statements and call the police as soon as you think you accidentally perchaced counterfeit goods.

Counterfeit goods are anywhere in the world these days. They are fake products designed to imitate genuine items such as luxury fashin, electronics, CDs, DVDs, medicines, and even food. While they may seem like a bargein, they come with serious risks. We should know that.

The Impact of Counterfeit Goods on Society
Counterfeiting harms businesses by reducing sales and damaging brand reputation. Governments lose tax revenue, affecting public services. More importantly, counterfeit goods can be dangerous—fake medicines may contain harmful substances, and counterfeit electronics often fail safety standards. Additionally, counterfeit trade is linked to organized crime, funding illegal activities.

How to recognize a Fake?
Recognizing counterfeit goods is crucial. Signs include poor-quality materials, incorrect logos, and suspiciously low prices. Authentic products often have serial numbers, security tags, or certificates of authenticity. If a deal seems too good to be true, it likely is. Check the website of the company (shopping site) who runs the business. You can check the comments form the viewers or customers as well.
You can find some negative comments from there and find out if it's suspecious.

What to Do If You Discover Counterfeit Goods
If you suspect a product is fake, avoid buying it. Report counterfeit goods to brand owners, consumer protection agencies, or law enforcement. Purchasing fake goods supports illegal trade and harms businesses. By spreading awareness, you can help prevent counterfeiting.

Staying informed protects both consumers and businesses. Choose authenticity and contribute to a safer marketplace.

activity_instructions: Apply the language you've learned in this lesson to a new topic: language learning. Write about issues and challenges that language students often face. Ask yourself guiding questions to help organize the writing. Type in the input box. Write 150-250 words.
student_submission:
Language learning can be an exciting yet challenging journey, often filled with moments of triumph—and frustration. Students typically face several obstacles that can impact their progress. One key question to ask is: **Why is it hard to learn a new language?** The answer often lies in motivation, exposure, and confidence.

🌍 **Lack of exposure**: Without consistent practice or access to native speakers, students might struggle to internalize the rhythm, tone, and usage of real-world language.

📚 **Grammar and vocabulary overload**: Students often feel overwhelmed by unfamiliar sentence structures and word lists. So another guiding question is: **How can learners make the process more manageable?**

😶‍🌫️ **Fear of making mistakes**: Many learners hesitate to speak for fear of being judged, slowing down fluency development. Asking, **What mindset helps students succeed?** can lead to strategies focused on resilience and progress over perfection.

👂 **Listening comprehension hurdles**: Spoken language is fast and nuanced. Training the ear through music, movies, or conversation can help bridge this gap.

Successful language learning requires persistence, curiosity, and a willingness to step outside one’s comfort zone. While every learner’s path is unique, confronting these challenges with patience and smart strategies can turn barriers into breakthroughs.

activity_instructions: Your teacher has asked you to write a short text about the parts of an airplane. Explain what each of the different parts are for, including the fuselage, wings, tail and engines. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Landing Gear

Landing gear position is controlled by a switch in the cockpit. In most airplanes, the gear switch is shaped like a wheel facilitate positive identification and to differentiate it from other cockpit controls.

An electrical landing gear retraction system utilizes an electrically driven motor for gear operation. The system is basically an electrically driven jack for raising and lowering the gear. When a switch in the cockpit is moved to the UP position, the electric motor operates. If the switch is moved to the DOWN position, the motor reverses and the gear moves down and locks.

The primary benefits of being able to retract the landing gear are increased climb performance and higher cruise airspeeds due to the resulting decrease in drag. Retractable landing gear systems may be operated either hydraulically or electrically, or may employ a combination of the two systems.

A landing gear safety switch, sometimes referred to as a ‘squat switch,’ is usually mounted in a bracket on one of the main gear shock struts.

Because of their complexity, retractable landing gears demand a close inspection prior to every flight. The inspection should begin inside the cockpit. The pilot should first make certain that the landing gear selector switch is in the GEAR DOWN position. The pilot should then turn on the battery master switch and ensure that the landing gear position indicators show that the gear is down and locked.

activity_instructions: You see a niche in the hotel market and decide to write a business proposal for investors. Write the **strategic summary** and **risk assessment** sections of the proposal using the notes. Write 140–200 words.
student_submission:
Strategic Summary
Zen is a boutique hotel that combines a spa, health, and fitness center, catering to the growing demand for wellness-focused weekend getaways. Market research from AccomData Group highlights increasing consumer interest in healthier lifestyles and dissatisfaction with the cuisine at many fitness centers. Zen will address this gap by offering a gourmet, health-conscious menu designed by top chefs from renowned restaurants. The facility will feature fully equipped gyms, swimming pools, and professional trainers, ensuring a premium wellness experience. Construction is expected to take two years, with returns on investment beginning in the second year after opening. Annual profits are projected at $1 million from the second year, with full investment recoupment anticipated within four years and sustained profitability from year five onward.

Risk Assessment
The financial projections account for potential economic downturns. However, if the economy remains stable, the investment recoupment period and profitability timeline could be significantly reduced. To ensure strong market penetration and brand recognition, an intensive media campaign will be managed by Kudos Advertising Agency, further mitigating risks and accelerating returns.

Email to Shareholders
Subject: An Important Update from Future Foundations Construction Company Regarding Your Investment
Dear Valued Shareholders,
We're writing to address some concerns you may have regarding the stability of the construction business and recent rumors about our share prices. We want to be absolutely clear: Future Foundations Construction Company is unwavering in its commitment to maintaining stability in the market, and the rumors circulating about our share prices are completely unfounded.
We acknowledge that our share value experienced a temporary drop approximately two months ago. This was a direct result of the resignation of our former CEO, Greg Johnson. However, we are thrilled to confirm that our share value has not only fully recovered but has rapidly increased to a historic high under the leadership of our new CEO, Harry Levi. Harry is a widely recognized and respected figure in the construction business, and his expertise is already proving invaluable.
In this dynamic market, Future Foundations is actively securing its stable future. We are proud to announce that we have already secured three significant contracts for the coming three years, guaranteeing a strong and consistent profit stream. This strategic foresight ensures our continued growth and protects your investment.
We deeply appreciate your continued loyalty and confidence in Future Foundations Construction Company. We are incredibly optimistic about the company's bright future and are committed to sharing our progress transparently. As a further reassurance, we will be sharing Future Foundations' comprehensive five-year roadmap with you shortly, outlining our strategic vision and growth projections.
Thank you for being an integral part of the Future Foundations family.
Sincerely,
The Future Foundations Construction Company Team

activity_instructions: Write a comparison-contrast essay about your favorite city and another place. Use the 'X then Y' structure. Be sure to polish your work before you submit it. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
When comparing Tokyo and New York City, it’s easy to see why they are often considered two of the most iconic metropolises in the world. Both are buzzing with energy, diversity, and endless opportunities, but they offer distinctly different experiences.

Tokyo is a city of contrasts. It’s meticulously clean and orderly, with an incredible public transport system that runs with precision. The culture emphasizes respect and harmony, making it feel safe and welcoming, even in a city of nearly 14 million people. From futuristic neighborhoods like Akihabara to serene shrines in Meiji Jingu, Tokyo blends its modern innovation with deep-rooted traditions. And, of course, its food—from sushi to ramen—is world-famous.

New York City, on the other hand, thrives on its raw energy and vibrancy. It’s loud, dynamic, and unapologetically chaotic in the best way. The subway system may not have Tokyo’s level of efficiency, but it connects people to neighborhoods brimming with unique personalities, from the art-filled streets of Brooklyn to the towering skyscrapers of Manhattan. NYC feels like the center of the world, a melting pot of cultures where ambition and creativity are celebrated.

While Tokyo feels like a symphony—precise, harmonious, and polished—New York is more like jazz: unpredictable, soulful, and alive. Both are unforgettable, but they captivate in their own unique ways.

activity_instructions: Apply the language you've learned in this lesson to a new topic: language learning. Write about issues and challenges that language students often face. Ask yourself guiding questions to help organize the writing. Type in the input box. Write 150-250 words.
student_submission:
Language students face a variety of issues and challenges that can hinder their learning progress. One of the primary obstacles is the difficulty of mastering pronunciation and grammar, especially when these differ significantly from their native language. This can lead to frustration and self-doubt, making it harder for students to stay motivated. Additionally, the lack of regular practice opportunities outside the classroom can result in limited language retention and fluency.

Cultural differences also pose a challenge, as understanding idiomatic expressions, social norms, and context-dependent meanings often requires more than just linguistic knowledge. These subtleties can make effective communication feel daunting for learners. Furthermore, language students may encounter a fear of making mistakes, which discourages them from speaking or participating actively.

Access to resources is another issue, as not all students have equal opportunities to engage with native speakers, language software, or immersive environments. Overcoming these challenges requires patience, support, and consistent practice to build confidence and competence.

Cheque as informações importantes. Saiba mais
"Sou CLT" significa que você trabalha com um contrato regido pela Consolidação das Leis do Trabalho (CLT), ou seja, você tem carteira assinada e possui direitos trabalhistas garantidos por lei, como férias, 13º salário, FGTS, entre outros. 
Em detalhes:
CLT (Consolidação das Leis do Trabalho):
É um conjunto de leis que regulamenta as relações de trabalho no Brasil, estabelecendo direitos e deveres tanto para empregados quanto para empregadores. 
Carteira assinada:
Quando alguém tem a carteira de trabalho assinada, significa que seu contrato de trabalho é formal e regido pela CLT. 
Direitos garantidos:
A CLT garante diversos benefícios e direitos aos trabalhadores, como férias remuneradas, 13º salário, FGTS (Fundo de Garantia do Tempo de Serviço), INSS (Instituto Nacional do Seguro Social), entre outros. 
Estabilidade:
O regime CLT oferece certa estabilidade ao trabalhador, pois o empregador só pode demitir o funcionário em algumas situações específicas e mediante o pagamento de verbas rescisórias. 
Portanto, ser CLT é estar amparado pela legislação trabalhista brasileira, com direitos e garantias que visam proteger o trabalhador durante o período de trabalho. 
As respostas de IA podem incluir erros.

activity_instructions: Write a paragraph about how media has changed in your lifetime. What media was important before? What do you use now, and how has it changed your reading habits? Pay attention to your use of commas, colons and semicolons. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words. Use your own words where possible.
student_submission: In the past, traditional media such as newspapers, magazines, and television were the most important sources of information and entertainment. I remember reading printed newspapers for local news and watching scheduled TV programs for global updates. These forms of media required patience and dedicated time, creating a routine around consuming information. Recently, the internet has revolutionized the way we engage with media: online platforms, social media, and streaming services have taken center stage. Now, I primarily rely on my smartphone to read news articles, scroll through social media feeds, and watch on-demand videos. This shift has made information more accessible and instant, but it has also changed my reading habits. Instead of reading long-form articles in newspapers, I skim through headlines or short summaries online. Lastly, the rise of e-books and audiobooks has further influenced how I consume content, as I now read and listen to books on digital devices. While these advancements have made media more convenient, they have also introduced challenges, such as information overload and reduced focus on in-depth reading.

First of all – the safety gear. While entering the construction site you must wear hard hats, protective gloves, safety boots and reflective waistcoats. activity_instructions: After the consultation, you write Pete a summary of his bad lifestyle habits and how to change them. Write the email below, including language of cause, effect, advice and describing benefits. Use the notes to help you. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Subject: Lifestyle Recommendations Following Our Consultation

Dear Pete,

Thank you for sharing your lifestyle details during our consultation. Here’s a summary of areas for improvement and advice on how to achieve a healthier lifestyle.

Current Habits and Their Effects:

Skipping Breakfast and Eating Fast Food: This can lead to energy crashes and weight gain. I recommend starting your day with a balanced breakfast rich in proteins and fibers. This will boost your energy and keep you fuller longer.

Sedentary Lifestyle: Lack of exercise contributes to back pain and fatigue. Aim to incorporate at least 30 minutes of physical activity daily, such as walking or stretching. This can reduce discomfort and increase your overall energy.

Poor Sleep Routine: Irregular sleep can cause persistent tiredness. Try to establish a consistent sleep schedule by going to bed and waking up at the same time each day. Quality sleep will improve your focus and mood.

Limited Social Interaction: Social isolation can affect mental health. Engaging in social activities or joining clubs can enhance your well-being and provide a support network.

Benefits:

Improved Energy Levels: Regular exercise and a nutritious diet will boost your energy.

Better Health: Balanced meals and physical activity can help manage weight and reduce health risks.

Enhanced Mental Well-Being: Adequate sleep and social connections are essential for mental health.

Implementing these changes can lead to a healthier and more fulfilling lifestyle. Please reach out if you need further guidance.

Best regards,

[Your Name] [Your Position] [Your Contact Information] [Your Department]

Feel free to adjust any details as needed!

activity_instructions: Write a paragraph about how media has changed in your lifetime. What media was important before? What do you use now, and how has it changed your reading habits? student_submission: Over the course of my lifetime, the media landscape has changed dramatically. In the past, traditional forms of media such as newspapers, magazines, and television were central to how people received information and entertainment. Newspapers and TV broadcasts provided daily updates on news, while magazines offered in-depth articles and features. These forms of media often required readers to set aside specific times for consumption. While this has made access to information faster and more interactive, it has also reduced my attention span for more detailed, traditional reading.

I’m really sorry to hear that you’re feeling stressed. It’s completely understandable given everything you’re dealing with. First, take a deep breath and remember that it’s okay to feel overwhelmed sometimes.

For your work-related stress, maybe try breaking tasks into smaller, manageable chunks. Prioritize what needs to be done first and tackle them one at a time. It might also help to set realistic deadlines and not be too hard on yourself.

Regarding your personal issues, talking to someone you trust can be really helpful. Sometimes just sharing what’s on your mind can lighten the load. If you’re comfortable, I’m here to listen.

activity_instructions: Write a comparison-contrast essay about your favorite city and another place. Use the 'X then Y' structure. Be sure to polish your work before you submit it. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Comparison of New York City and Los Angeles

New York City and Los Angeles are two of the most iconic cities in the United States, but they offer very different lifestyles. New York City is known for its fast-paced environment and towering skyscrapers. The city is bustling 24/7, and there's always something to do, whether it's exploring Broadway shows, visiting museums, or simply walking through the busy streets. The energy of the city is contagious, and people often rely on public transportation to get around due to the city's compact nature.

In contrast, Los Angeles presents a more laid-back atmosphere. While it is a major urban hub, its sprawling layout and car-centric culture create a more relaxed vibe compared to New York. The city is famous for its entertainment industry, with Hollywood being the heart of the film and television world. The sunny weather and proximity to beautiful beaches also make Los Angeles a more outdoor-oriented city, with residents enjoying activities like hiking, surfing, or relaxing by the ocean.

While New York thrives on its density and constant activity, Los Angeles shines with its open spaces and focus on leisure. Both cities have unique offerings, yet they are polar opposites in terms of pace and lifestyle.

activity_instructions: A website has invited you to write your opinion on the topic of corporate social responsibility. Read the postings before you begin. Remember the structure you've learned on how to construct an argument. Write 200-250 words.
student_submission:
Do you believe companies have a responsibility to society? Or do you think a company's only responsibility is to its shareholders? We invite you to join this discussion by posting your opinion on corporate social responsibility (CSR). Below are some quotes from recent submissions. We look forward to hearing from you!



Companies have a big impact on society. They should help the communities where they operate. After all, those communities are letting them do business there. It's a two-way street. And it's the same with sustainable operations and fair employee benefits. The former secures future possibilities, and the latter ensures high productivity and low turnover.


The reason CSR makes good business sense, the reason it contributes to the bottom line, is because consumers care. Companies with a good CSR record are rewarded by customer loyalty. Consumers are happy, the company performs well and communities around the world benefit.


As an integrated part of society, corporations need to conform to social expectations, and that entails helping the community.
– James.W@efstudent.com

Against CSR

The problem with corporate social responsibility is that corporations don't have social responsibility. Milton Friedman has pointed out that the real responsibility of business is to increase its profits; business is not answerable to society's expectations but to the shareholders'.


It's great that corporations are spending huge sums of money on development projects across the world, but these sums of money are usually still inconsiderable relative to total earnings. In this sense, it's still quite a cheap marketing device to buy a good public image.


It's the government's job to make and enforce laws and regulations that will benefit the greater public. Corporations will need to conform to these regulations, but by no means should they be put in the driver's seat.

activity_instructions: Your research team is investigating the leisure habits of people of different age groups. You are attending a seminar on research done into the leisure trends of seniors citizens. Look at the note paper you’ve prepared to remind yourself of the key points you want to know, then listen to the seminar and take notes.
student_submission:
For: Chester Health Authority 
About: A one-year research project on the leisure habits of its seniors. 
When: In 2009
Why: The Authority wanted to see if there was any correlation in changes in leisure habits and the number of visits to doctors' clinics and hospitals by seniors aged 60 and over. 
Results: the research suggested that seniors eat out less frequently than they did in the previous decade 90% of them attributed this to increases in restaurant prices and the falling standard of food quality and hygiene. There also seemed to be a strong correlation between high-income holders in the 80-plus category, who now regarded using the internet to shop for food as a leisure activity. Also, about 10% of women interviewed suggested it was more relaxing than going to yoga, and far less stressful than standing in supermarket lineups. What I found of particular interest was a marked increase in the use of computers by all senior groups in the study, men and female alike, regardless of age. There seemed to be a strong correlation between this and the number of hours per week seniors left their houses or residential homes. So it appeared that seniors were staying at home playing and working on their computers and going out less. This was in sharp contrast to figures produced by Fletcher in the UK in the early 1990s, which suggested that seniors were doing far more walking than before in order to get to their local libraries to use public computers and free internet services. 
Recommendations: suggests that seniors use their computers almost as much as young people. This, however, is not necessarily good for their health.

activity_instructions: You are writing to Harry, a new manager in your company. He wants advice on how to effectively motivate his team and what strategies to avoid. Use the language and strategies you have learned in this lesson. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Hi Harry,

Congratulations on your new role as a manager! Motivating your team is key to achieving success, and there are several strategies you can use.

First, make sure to set clear goals and expectations. When your team understands what’s expected of them, they are more likely to stay focused and motivated. It’s also important to recognize and celebrate individual and team accomplishments—this boosts morale and fosters a positive work environment.

Additionally, encourage open communication. Regular check-ins and feedback sessions allow team members to share ideas, concerns, and challenges. This helps you build trust and demonstrates that you value their input.

On the flip side, avoid micromanaging. Trust your team to complete their tasks without constant oversight. Overloading team members with work or setting unrealistic expectations can lead to burnout, so be mindful of workload balance.

Lastly, foster an inclusive environment where everyone feels valued. Encouraging collaboration and providing opportunities for professional development can help your team stay engaged and motivated.

Best of luck in your management journey!

activity_instructions: A website has invited you to write your opinion on the topic of corporate social responsibility. Read the postings before you begin. Remember the structure you've learned on how to construct an argument. Write 200-250 words.
student_submission:
Corporate social responsibility (CSR) is a vital aspect of modern business practices. It refers to the commitment of companies to conduct their operations in a way that benefits society and the environment, in addition to their shareholders. CSR initiatives can include efforts like reducing carbon footprints, supporting local communities, and ensuring ethical labor practices. I believe that CSR is not just a marketing tool but a genuine responsibility that companies should embrace.

First, companies have a moral obligation to contribute positively to society. In an era where global challenges such as climate change and social inequality are pressing, corporations must take active steps to address these issues. By doing so, they demonstrate their commitment to sustainability and ethical standards, which can improve their public image and create trust with consumers.

Second, CSR is also beneficial to businesses in the long term. Companies that adopt socially responsible practices can attract loyal customers who value ethical considerations. Moreover, employees are often more engaged and motivated when they work for companies that are committed to making a positive impact. In the long run, this can lead to increased productivity and profitability.

In conclusion, CSR is not a mere trend but a crucial element of a responsible and successful business strategy. Companies should recognize the importance of their social impact and integrate it into their core values for the benefit of both society and their bottom line.

activity_instructions: Write a description of a legendary creature that’s popular in your country, or one you find interesting. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
One fascinating legendary creature from India is the Rakshasa, a powerful and fearsome being from Hindu mythology. Rakshasas are often depicted as shape-shifting demons with immense strength, magical abilities, and a taste for chaos. Some are malevolent, terrorizing villages and opposing gods and heroes, while others are noble warriors.
According to ancient texts, Rakshasas can take on different forms to deceive their enemies. Some appear as monstrous beings with sharp claws, fangs, and bloodshot eyes, while others disguise themselves as ordinary humans. They are known to possess mystical abilities like invisibility, flying, and creating illusions.
One of the most famous Rakshasas is Ravana, the ten-headed king of Lanka from the epic Ramayana. Though portrayed as a villain, Ravana was also a formidable scholar and warrior, skilled in the arts, politics, and warfare. His story adds depth to the legend of Rakshasas, showing them as more than mere monsters—they are complex beings with ambition, intelligence, and power.
These creatures continue to inspire tales of heroism and caution, reinforcing the eternal battle between good and evil in Indian folklore.
