activity_instructions: Read an email from your friend and give advice on some stressful problems he is having. Type in the input box. Write 100-200 words.
student_submission:
Hi Leon,

Thank you for opening up—I'm really sorry to hear you're going through such a tough time. It sounds like work has become a major source of stress, especially with management not recognizing your efforts. That kind of environment can really wear you down, and it’s understandable to feel drained and unmotivated. You're not alone in feeling this way, and your frustration is completely valid.

As for things with Tia, I’m really sorry that’s weighing on you too. Relationship uncertainty can feel like the ground is shifting beneath you, especially when you had hope for something more lasting. It’s okay to feel down—this is a lot to carry at once.

Give yourself credit for reaching out and being honest about how you’re feeling—that takes real strength. If you're ever unsure what to do next, maybe just start small: talk to someone you trust, write down what’s bothering you, or even think about what a better situation would look like and how you might slowly get there.

I’m here for you anytime.

Take care,
AM

activity_instructions: You're going to write about an interesting, fictional event that happened to a friend. Write your blog post. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Title: The Day the Moon Sneezed

Hey [Friend's Name],

You’re not going to believe what happened last night — and no, this isn’t another one of my “sleep-deprived dreams.” Or maybe it is, but I swear it felt too real not to share.

At exactly 2:47 AM, the sky lit up with a strange shimmer — not lightning, not a plane, but a slow pulsing glow that seemed to come from the moon itself. I rubbed my eyes, stepped onto the balcony, and that’s when it happened…

The moon sneezed.

I’m serious. One big “Achoooo!” echoed across the sky (I still don’t know how I heard it, but I did), and a ring of stardust erupted outward like cosmic glitter. For a moment, time just paused. Birds in mid-flight hung like decorations. My neighbor’s cat froze mid-pounce. Even my Wi-Fi stopped buffering.

Then things got weirder. The sneeze must’ve triggered some kind of lunar allergy because the moon began sniffling. A small comet floated up with a giant tissue — yes, with little stars printed on it — and gently dabbed the moon’s surface. Where it touched, new craters formed, and one of them looks suspiciously like a thumbs-up emoji.

This morning, no news channel mentioned it. No social media buzz. Just silence, like the universe decided this one was for the night owls only.

Anyway, if you look up tonight and see the moon looking a little red-eyed and drowsy, now you’ll know why.

Stay curious,
[Your Name]

activity_instructions: Read an email from your friend and give advice on some stressful problems he is having. Type in the input box. Write 100-200 words.
student_submission:
Hi My friend

Sounds like you've been having such a terrible time of it, at least things can't get any worse.
From here on things can only get better, try not to worry too much about it.
In relation to work, you don't necessarily need to receive recognition from other people. Knowing that you're doing a good job should be enough for you; you have a job title by your effort.
If after this you still don't feel happy, you can look for other job options without leaving your current one until you receive other job offers or have enough savings to cover your expenses while you find another job.
Regarding the other issue that worries you, you should talk to your partner and be honest about the problems you're having. Communication is the foundation of a relationship. Once you know what the conflict is, you can find a solution.

Whenever you need to talk, we can meet. I'll always be by your side.

Sincerely Ary

Include details about distances and geographical features.

Also include a fixed phrase of persuasion that you have studied.
student_submission: Nestled between gentle hills and winding rivers, the town of Ashland lies just 15 miles north of the Oregon-California border, surrounded by the Siskiyou Mountains. Known for its vibrant arts scene and the annual Oregon Shakespeare Festival, Ashland combines natural beauty with cultural charm. Lithia Park, stretching over 90 acres from the town center into the forested foothills, offers a perfect escape into nature. With Interstate 5 running nearby, access to Medford—only 12 miles away—is quick and easy. All things considered, there's no better place to experience small-town life with big personality.

activity_instructions: You work for an electronics company and are preparing a speech for a celebration dinner. Include a greeting/opening, a part where you show thanks, and a conclusion where you try to motivate the staff. Type in the input box. Write 125–200 words.
student_submission:
Good evening, everyone.

It's a pleasure to see you all here tonight to celebrate another year of hard work and achievements, remembering that it's the key of success. As Thomas Edison once said, "There is no substitute for hard work", and this is the spirit that has moved us as a "One Team".

I want to express my deepest gratitude to all of you. Your relentless efforts and strong commitment with our company, have been the driving force to meet our sales goals. This wouldn't have been possible without your hard work and perseverance.

I don't want to extend a lot, but let me close with another quote of Winston Churchill: "Success is not the final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts". We have faced and shared a lot of challenges, but we have also proven that when we focus and work together, we are ready to achieve even greater goals.

Thank you, and let's enjoy the rest of the evening!

activity_instructions: A website has invited you to write your opinion on the topic of corporate social responsibility. Read the postings before you begin. Remember the structure you've learned on how to construct an argument. Write 200-250 words.
student_submission:
For Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR):

Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) is vital for modern businesses as it aligns with ethical practices and sustainable growth. Proponents argue that CSR enhances a company's reputation, builds consumer trust, and fosters customer loyalty. By addressing social and environmental issues, companies can differentiate themselves from competitors and create a positive brand image. CSR initiatives can lead to operational efficiencies and cost savings, such as reducing waste or conserving energy. Furthermore, engaging in CSR attracts and retains employees who value social consciousness in their workplace. It also opens up new market opportunities by appealing to socially responsible investors and consumers. Ultimately, CSR contributes to long-term business success and societal well-being.

Against Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR):

Critics of CSR argue that it diverts focus from a company's primary economic role—maximizing shareholder value. CSR can be seen as a distraction, imposing additional costs and operational complexities that do not directly contribute to profit. Some believe that CSR initiatives are often superficial, serving as public relations tools rather than genuine commitments to social change. This "greenwashing" can mislead consumers and stakeholders. Additionally, detractors claim that CSR efforts can lead to conflicts of interest, with businesses potentially prioritizing social goals over economic performance. Critics assert that the responsibility for societal and environmental challenges should lie with governments and NGOs, not profit-driven corporations.

activity_instructions: As there were a few problems with Cessna 123's landing, you have been asked to write a report by your superiors. Write the report below. Write 100 - 150 words.
student_submission:
On June 15, 2025, Cessna 123 experienced minor complications during its landing at Springfield Regional Airport. During final approach, the aircraft encountered unexpected crosswind gusts up to 18 knots, which affected alignment with Runway 27. The aircraft made a hard landing, resulting in a bounce and a brief veer to the left before the pilot regained full control. No injuries were reported, and the aircraft taxied safely to the gate.

Preliminary checks suggest possible minor issues with the nose gear shock absorption system. Weather conditions were within operational limits, but the gusts were stronger than forecasted. The flight crew followed standard procedures and responded promptly to the situation.

The aircraft has been temporarily grounded for a full inspection. Further investigation is underway to determine whether any mechanical or procedural factors contributed to the incident. Recommendations will be issued following the maintenance report.

activity_instructions: You work in the pharmaceutical industry. Your boss has asked you to summarize an article for him so that he can better talk in English about the major players in the industry. Summarize the article. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Most of the pharmaceutical industry is concentrated in developed regions – the U.S., Europe and Japan.   

GlaxoSmithKline is a leading company focusing on research. The company was formed through the merger of Glaxo Wellcome and SmithKline Beecham. It holds an estimated 7 percent of the world's pharmaceutical market and is concentrated on four therapeutic areas (anti-infectives, central nervous system, respiratory and gastro-metabolic). Among its most prominent products are Paxil for depression, Advair for asthma, Hycamtin and Zofran for treating cancer. leader in the vaccine area.

Pfizer is one of the world's largest consumer healthcare and pharmaceutical companies, having acquired Warner-Lambert. The company has three business segments: human health, animal health and consumer healthcare. The consumer business includes many of the world's best-known brands, among them Halls, Tetra, Benadryl, Sudafed, Listerine, Desitin, Schick, Visine, Bengay, Lubriderm and Zantac.

Another leading company is Merck, a global, research-driven pharmaceutical company working toward the discovery, development, manufacturing and marketing of a broad range of human and animal health products – directly and through its joint ventures. Merck also provides group prescription drug benefit services through Merck-Medco Managed Care LLC (Merck-Medco).

activity_instructions: Think of something weird, exciting or funny that happened to you recently, and describe it in an email to a friend. Make it interesting and descriptive, and remember to check for pronoun reference. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Hey [Friend’s Name],

Something absolutely hilarious happened to me the other day, and I had to tell you! I was walking home from the store with a bag of groceries when I noticed a squirrel acting... oddly. It was perched on the edge of a trash can, staring me down like I’d wronged it in another life.

As I got closer, it lunged at me—yes, lunged—and grabbed the loaf of bread sticking out of my bag! For a second, I just froze, completely stunned. Then the bread slipped from the bag, and the squirrel bolted up a nearby tree, clutching it triumphantly.

Here’s where it gets funnier: halfway up, the squirrel dropped the bread, and it landed on a guy’s head who was just passing by. He looked up, confused, then spotted me laughing uncontrollably. I managed to explain, and we both ended up cracking up over the whole thing.

I never thought I’d lose a loaf of bread to a squirrel, but here we are! How’s life on your end?

Talk soon,

activity_instructions: You work for an electronics company and are preparing a speech for a celebration dinner. Include a greeting/opening, a part where you show thanks, and a conclusion where you try to motivate the staff. Type in the input box. Write 125–200 words.
student_submission:
Hi,

Earlier you emailed me for some ideas on what to include in your speech. Here's what I'd suggest:

Greet the audience as usual, and say what the purpose of your speech is.
A quote is an easy way to give your speech more meaning. How about this one: 'There's no substitute for hard work.' – Thomas Edison
It's a reminder that there really are no short cuts in our industry, and success only comes with hard work. Feel free to use your own quote, though.
Show thanks to the staff for their hard work this year. They've done a lot of overtime to make sure our sales goals were met.
Close the speech with another quote that'll motivate them. Here's one I suggest: 'Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.' – Winston Churchill
We've had some hard times this year, and although we've met our goals (barely), the staff will need some motivation to push harder next year. That quote is quite relevant, I think.
Good luck!

J.H.

student_submission:
Thank you all for joining us tonight to celebrate the incredible achievements of our team. This year has been a monumental one for our electronics company, and it's all because of your hard work and dedication.

First and foremost, I want to extend my deepest gratitude to each and every one of you. Your relentless pursuit of excellence and innovation has brought us to new heights. From our engineers to our sales team, from our support staff to our executives, every single person here has played a vital role in our success. Thank you for your unwavering commitment and for going above and beyond in everything you do.

As we look ahead, let’s carry this momentum forward. The future is full of exciting opportunities and challenges. Together, we can continue to push boundaries and set new standards in the industry. Let’s stay inspired, stay driven, and never lose sight of our goals.

Subject: Important Updates and Priorities for the Team

Dear Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to provide you with a few important updates and clarify our current priorities. Please review the following points carefully:

US Client Designs – High Priority

Our work with the US client is of utmost importance. Successfully completing this project could lead to future collaborations, so let's ensure we maintain our focus and dedication. While progress has been somewhat slow, it remains satisfactory. I appreciate your hard work and encourage you to keep up the excellent effort!

New Hires – Also Important

As we look ahead to the upcoming quarter, please be aware that we will have two staff members leaving in Q2. It is crucial that we find suitable replacements to maintain our workflow. If you know of any potential candidates who might be a good fit for our team, please reach out to me directly.

Marketing Media Reorganization – Not Important

Currently, the project related to the reorganization of our marketing media is on hold. The process has proven to be quite messy and requires significant effort, and given our current priorities, we are freezing this project for the time being.

Thank you for your attention to these matters. Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or suggestions.

Best regards,

activity_instructions: You need to address the concerns of your company's shareholders. Write an email to reassure them. Read your notes first. Type in the input box. Write 150–250 words.
student_submission:
Subject: Reassurance and Future Plans for Future Foundations Construction Company

Dear Valued Shareholders,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to address some concerns that have been raised regarding the stability of our construction business and the recent rumors about our share prices.

Firstly, I want to assure you that Future Foundations Construction Company is committed to maintaining stability in the market. The rumors about our share prices plummeting and wiping out investments are entirely unfounded. While it is true that our share value experienced a drop two months ago, this was due to the resignation of our former CEO, Greg Johnson.

However, I am pleased to inform you that with the appointment of our new CEO, Harry Levi, a well-known and respected figure in the industry, our share value has not only recovered but has also reached a historic high. Harry's leadership and vision have been instrumental in this swift turnaround.

In addition to this positive development, we have secured three significant contracts for the next three years, ensuring guaranteed profits and further stability in this otherwise volatile market. These contracts are a testament to our strong market position and the trust our clients place in us.

We deeply appreciate your loyalty and support during these times. Your confidence in Future Foundations is invaluable, and we are committed to a bright and prosperous future. To further reassure you, we will soon share our comprehensive five-year road map, outlining our strategic plans and growth trajectory.

Thank you once again for your continued trust and investment in Future Foundations Construction Company.

Warm regards,

Ken
Future Foundations Construction Company

activity_instructions: Your boss has asked you to write a formal report recommending a training company. You've chosen Skills Pro. Use your notes to write up the report. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Recommendation Report: Training Providers

After evaluating two training options, TrainQuick and Skills Pro, I recommend Skills Pro as the best choice for our team. Below is an overview of the findings.

TrainQuick stands out for being affordable and flexible. However, its main drawback is the lack of engagement from employees, particularly when mixed with participants from other branches. This has led to low participation and limited success in similar settings.

In contrast, Skills Pro offers a more structured and effective approach, despite being more expensive. While some have found the course content demanding, it has a strong completion rate. Additionally, their plans to expand the course offerings make this provider a forward-thinking choice.

Although TrainQuick is a cost-effective solution, the focus of this initiative is to ensure meaningful development and impactful learning outcomes. The quality of Skills Pro justifies the additional investment, as it aligns with our goal of fostering professional growth.

In conclusion, Skills Pro is the most reliable option to achieve our objectives, and I recommend moving forward with their training programs.

activity_instructions: You're going to write about an interesting, fictional event that happened to a friend. Write your blog post. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
The Importance of Mindfulness in Daily Life

In today’s fast-paced world, many of us are constantly juggling work, family, and social commitments. With so many distractions, it’s easy to lose touch with the present moment. This is where mindfulness comes in.

Mindfulness is the practice of being fully present, aware of your thoughts, emotions, and surroundings without judgment. It helps you break free from autopilot mode, where you simply go through the motions of life without truly experiencing it.

One of the simplest ways to practice mindfulness is through deep breathing exercises. By focusing on your breath, you allow yourself to reconnect with the present, reducing stress and anxiety. Studies have shown that regular mindfulness practice can improve mental clarity, increase emotional regulation, and even enhance physical health by lowering blood pressure.

Incorporating mindfulness into your daily routine doesn’t require major changes. Whether it’s taking a few minutes in the morning to set an intention, practicing mindful eating, or just pausing throughout the day to check in with yourself, small moments of mindfulness can have a profound impact on your overall well-being.

As we continue to navigate our busy lives, mindfulness offers us a way to slow down, recalibrate, and be more intentional with our time and energy. So, take a deep breath and embrace the present—it’s worth it.

activity_instructions: You are writing to Harry, a new manager in your company. He wants advice on how to effectively motivate his team and what strategies to avoid. Use the language and strategies you have learned in this lesson. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Hi Harry,

Here are some effective strategies to help you motivate your team:

Incentivize employees: Make it clear that the company’s success translates into their success too. Offering rewards or recognition for achievements can boost motivation.
Invest in their development: Take an active interest in your employees’ career growth. Provide opportunities for training and mentorship to help them advance.
Promote work-life balance: Show understanding for your employees' personal lives. Encourage a healthy balance to help them stay refreshed and engaged at work.
Listen to your team: Ensure employees feel heard, even if they're voicing concerns or complaints. This will make them feel valued and more willing to contribute.
Treat others with respect: Always treat your subordinates the way you would want to be treated by your superiors. Respect fosters a positive and motivating work environment.
At the same time, be mindful of actions that can demotivate your team:

Disrespecting subordinates or taking credit for their work can harm morale.
Losing your temper or blaming others unfairly will create an atmosphere of fear and distrust.
Failing to recognize or praise good work can lead to disengagement.
Good luck in leading your team!

Best,
Divya

activity_instructions: Listen to the radiotelephony messages and write down the letters and numbers.
student_submission:
Landing Gear

Landing gear position is controlled by a switch in the cockpit. In most airplanes, the gear switch is shaped like a wheel facilitate positive identification and to differentiate it from other cockpit controls.

An electrical landing gear retraction system utilizes an electrically driven motor for gear operation. The system is basically an electrically driven jack for raising and lowering the gear. When a switch in the cockpit is moved to the UP position, the electric motor operates. If the switch is moved to the DOWN position, the motor reverses and the gear moves down and locks.

The primary benefits of being able to retract the landing gear are increased climb performance and higher cruise airspeeds due to the resulting decrease in drag. Retractable landing gear systems may be operated either hydraulically or electrically, or may employ a combination of the two systems.

A landing gear safety switch, sometimes referred to as a ‘squat switch,’ is usually mounted in a bracket on one of the main gear shock struts.

Because of their complexity, retractable landing gears demand a close inspection prior to every flight. The inspection should begin inside the cockpit. The pilot should first make certain that the landing gear selector switch is in the GEAR DOWN position. The pilot should then turn on the battery master switch and ensure that the landing gear position indicators show that the gear is down and locked.

Normally, the landing gear should be retracted after lift-off when the airplane has reached an altitude where, in the event of an engine failure or other emergency requiring an aborted takeoff, the airplane could no longer be landed on the runway. This procedure, however, may not apply to all situations.

The operating loads placed on the landing gear at higher airspeeds may cause structural damage due to the forces of the airstream. Limiting speeds, therefore, are established for gear operation to protect the gear components from becoming overstressed during flight.

When the plane is approaching the runway for landing, the landing gear is extended by placing the gear selector switch in the GEAR DOWN position. As the landing gear extends, the airspeed will decrease and the pitch attitude may increase. During the several seconds it takes for the gear to extend, the pilot should be attentive to any abnormal sounds or feel. The pilot should confirm that the landing gear has extended and locked by the normal sound and feel of the system operation as well as by the gear position indicators in the cockpit.

I hope this email finds you well.

I wanted to provide a brief summary of our project meeting held today, April 5th, 2025.

**Attendees:**

- Jane Doe

- Emily Davis

activity_instructions: Think of something weird, exciting or funny that happened to you recently, and describe it in an email to a friend. Make it interesting and descriptive, and remember to check for pronoun reference. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Subject: You Won't Believe What Happened!

Hey Shruti,

I hope you're doing well! I just had to share this bizarre and hilarious experience I had last weekend. So, I decided to take a spontaneous trip to the local farmer's market. As I was browsing through the stalls, I stumbled upon a vendor selling "magical" mushrooms. Naturally, my curiosity got the best of me, and I struck up a conversation with the vendor.

He claimed that these mushrooms could make you hear music when you eat them. Skeptical but intrigued, I bought a small batch. Later that evening, I decided to try one. To my surprise, I started hearing faint melodies! It was like having a personal concert in my head. I couldn't stop laughing at how absurd and amazing it was.

The next day, I went back to the market to thank the vendor, only to find out that the mushrooms were just regular ones, and the music was all in my head! Turns out, my mind played a trick on me. It was such a weird but exciting experience that I just had to share it with you.

Can't wait to catch up soon!

Cheers, Shraddha

activity_instructions: Write a criticism of a celebrity. It can be a particular celebrity or the whole idea of celebrity in general. Use some of the language you have learned for criticizing in this lesson. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
In February, Jennifer Lopez released a bundle of multimedia projects that were each part of a larger statement—arguably, a misguided one—about the power of love or something. One of those was This Is Me … Now, a very cheesy and otherwise unremarkable late-career pop album. The other was This Is Me … Now: A Love Story, a loosely biographical, somewhat egomaniacal adaptation of the album into a blockbuster musical full of astrological melodrama, flashy choreography, and celebrity cameos. Finally, a couple of weeks later, Lopez released The Greatest Love Story Never Told, a behind-the-scenes documentary that’s chiefly about the making of This Is Me … Now: A Love Story but is more notable for its awkwardly invasive glimpses into J.Lo’s famed romance with a dutifully supportive but quite visibly mortified Ben Affleck. 
This is all, taken together, as overproduced and exasperating as it sounds. Each project has been met with mixed-to-bad reviews and general mockery on social media.

activity_instructions: Write a description of a legendary creature that’s popular in your country, or one you find interesting. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
One legendary creature that fascinates me is the Kitsune from Japanese folklore. Kitsune are fox spirits known for their intelligence and magical abilities. They can shape-shift into human form, often appearing as beautiful women. Kitsune are believed to live for centuries, and as they age, they grow more tails, with the most powerful ones having up to nine tails.

These creatures are often depicted as tricksters, using their cunning to deceive humans. However, they can also be benevolent, serving as guardians and protectors. Kitsune are associated with the Shinto deity Inari, the god of rice, fertility, and prosperity. Inari's foxes are considered messengers and are often seen at shrines dedicated to this deity.

The dual nature of Kitsune—both mischievous and protective—makes them intriguing figures in Japanese mythology. Their stories reflect themes of transformation, wisdom, and the balance between good and evil. Whether as playful tricksters or loyal guardians, Kitsune continue to captivate the imagination and remain a beloved part of Japanese cultural heritage.

activity_instructions: Think of something weird, exciting or funny that happened to you recently, and describe it in an email to a friend. Make it interesting and descriptive, and remember to check for pronoun reference. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Subject: You Won't Believe What Happened!

Hey ,

I hope you're doing well! I just had to share this bizarre and hilarious experience I had last weekend. So, I decided to go for a walk in the park to clear my mind. As I was strolling along, I noticed a group of people gathered around a tree, looking up and laughing. Naturally, my curiosity got the better of me, and I joined them to see what was going on.

To my surprise, there was a squirrel hanging upside down from a branch, holding onto a piece of pizza! It was like something out of a cartoon. The squirrel seemed completely unfazed by the crowd and was munching away happily. People were taking pictures and videos, and I couldn't help but laugh at the absurdity of the situation.

Just when I thought it couldn't get any funnier, a dog came running over, barking excitedly at the squirrel. The squirrel, still clutching its pizza, made a daring leap to another tree, leaving the dog bewildered. The whole scene was so unexpected and amusing that it made my day.

I hope this little story brings a smile to your face. Let me know if anything equally weird or funny has happened to you recently!

activity_instructions: Use the information in the notes to write an informative text about NAFTA, or write about a trade agreement your country is a part of. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
The North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) is a significant trade pact between the United States, Canada, and Mexico. Coming into force in January 1994 after years of negotiation, NAFTA aimed to reduce or eliminate customs duties among its member states. This agreement has profoundly impacted trade relations, particularly in the agricultural sector. For instance, it facilitated the flow of Mexican fruits and vegetables into the US market.

NAFTA has had both positive and negative effects on its members. On the positive side, it has boosted trade and economic growth, created jobs, and lowered prices for consumers. However, it has also led to job losses in certain industries and raised concerns about labor and environmental standards.

Overall, NAFTA has been beneficial for all three member countries, enhancing their economic integration and cooperation. Despite its challenges, the agreement remains a cornerstone of North American trade relations. this is all about the NAFTA

activity_instructions: Write a paragraph describing how robots are being used in your country. How do you feel about them? In what ways will they positively and negatively affect society? Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Robots are being used in many ways in my country, helping in industries like manufacturing, healthcare, and even at home. In factories, robots are used for tasks like assembling products, welding, and packing. They work quickly and accurately, helping to make products faster and at a lower cost. In healthcare, robots assist in surgeries, making procedures more precise, and some robots help take care of elderly people or deliver medicine in hospitals.

While robots offer many benefits, they also have some downsides. One concern is that they may replace human jobs, especially in factories. This can lead to unemployment for people who rely on those jobs. Another issue is that robots depend on technology, and if that technology fails or is hacked, it could cause problems. However, on the positive side, robots can improve safety by doing dangerous jobs and help people in ways that humans can't, like performing delicate surgeries.

Overall, robots can improve life in many ways, but we need to carefully balance their use to avoid harm to society.

activity_instructions: Write a description of a legendary creature that’s popular in your country, or one you find interesting. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
The Kitsune is a legendary creature from Japanese folklore, renowned for its mystical and enigmatic nature. Often depicted as a fox, the Kitsune possesses the extraordinary ability to shape-shift into a human form, usually that of a beautiful woman. These magical foxes are believed to be highly intelligent and possess long lifespans, gaining a new tail for every hundred years they live, up to a maximum of nine tails. With each additional tail, their power and wisdom increase.
Kitsune are known for their cunning and trickery, delighting in playing pranks on humans. However, they can also be benevolent, offering guidance and protection to those they favor. In some stories, they serve as faithful guardians of the Inari deity, the Shinto god of rice, fertility, and prosperity. The dual nature of the Kitsune, embodying both mischief and benevolence, makes them a fascinating and enduring figure in Japanese culture. The allure of the Kitsune lies in its mystery, its blend of beauty and danger, and its representation of the fine line between the human and the supernatural.

activity_instructions: Using your notes, draft a speech with a consistent metaphor. Add variety by using different terms for teams and problems. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.

Ladies and Gentlemen,

Today, we stand at the helm of a renewed partnership with Crum, a testament to our unwavering commitment to excellence. Crum has lauded our dedication to quality, a recognition that fuels our drive to continually improve.

Three months ago, we faced a storm of unresolved defects, coupled with other technical challenges that threatened to derail our progress. However, our team navigated these turbulent waters with resilience and innovation. We overhauled our update delivery system, implementing a more agile and responsive approach that allowed us to address issues swiftly and efficiently. Additionally, we refined our Quality Assurance processes by incorporating automated testing and continuous integration, ensuring that our products meet the highest standards of quality before reaching our customers.

As we look to the future, we pledge to provide unwavering support to prevent any potential issues with our customers. Together, we will sail towards new horizons, fortified by the lessons we've learned and the improvements we've made.

Thank you.

White Space Associates Denounces False Rumors

White Space Associates firmly denies the recent false claims regarding a drop in our share prices. These baseless rumors emerged just as we commenced construction on Mishima Corporation's new HQ, a project we secured by outperforming 20 top agencies, with Mr. Mishima himself approving our design.

activity_instructions: You are applying for a position as a manager at a major company. Imagine you have extensive business qualifications and experience, and write your cover letter. Read the example cover letter. Type in the input box. Write 45-65 words. Use your own words where possible.
student_submission:
The Power of Nature

Nature has always been a source of inspiration and tranquility for humans. From the towering mountains to the deep oceans, the natural world offers endless beauty and mysteries to explore. Many people find peace in the simple act of walking through a forest, listening to the sound of the wind in the trees, or watching the sunset over a calm lake. But nature also teaches us important lessons about balance, resilience, and the interconnectedness of all living things. As we continue to face challenges such as climate change and environmental destruction, it’s more important than ever to respect and protect the planet that sustains us. The more we understand nature, the more we realize how crucial it is for our survival and well-being.

activity_instructions: Now write up the research proposal. Use the notes to help you. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Research Proposal: University Research Project
Title: Comparing First-Year Students' Attitudes Towards Traditional Classroom vs. Online Learning Environments
Introduction:
The University is embarking on a research project to explore the attitudes of first-year students towards traditional classroom settings compared to online learning environments. This study will include both mature students and school leavers entering university. The primary aim is to understand students' preferences and the potential demand for virtual classrooms during vacation periods.
Objectives:
To compare the attitudes of first-year students towards traditional classroom settings and online learning environments.
To include perspectives from both mature students and school leavers.
To determine whether students would be interested in attending classes in a virtual classroom during vacation time, how often and why.
Methodology:
qualitative methods with interviews and focus groups
Timeline:
a period of three months. 
Conclusion:
This research project represents an important step in understanding the evolving educational preferences of first-year university students.

activity_instructions: Your company is changing its logo, and two managers are discussing how to explain the change. Listen to their conversation and write a formal email based on what you hear. Type in the input box. Write 120–150 words.

Subject: Exciting News: Our New Logo

Dear Valued Clients,

We are thrilled to announce an important change at our company: we are updating our company logo! After extensive market research and feedback from a recent survey, we discovered that while our products are well-loved, our formal logo was perceived as outdated. To better reflect our commitment to innovation and excellence, we have designed a modern logo that aligns with our brand vision.

This change not only revitalizes our image but also strengthens our position as a leader in the industry. We believe this new look will enhance our reputation and resonate with our valued customers.

Your opinions matter greatly to us, and we would love to hear your thoughts on this transformation. Please feel free to reach out with any feedback or questions.

Thank you for your continued support!

Best regards,

Ignacio Sagarzazu
Marketing manager
Best products Co.

activity_instructions: Write a description of a legendary creature that’s popular in your country, or one you find interesting. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
One legendary creature that has captivated the imagination of many in my country is the Wendigo. Rooted in Indigenous folklore, particularly in the northern regions, the Wendigo is a terrifying, malevolent spirit often associated with winter, famine, and greed. Described as a tall, emaciated figure with glowing eyes, the Wendigo is said to have a hunger that cannot be satisfied, driven by an insatiable craving for human flesh.

What makes the Wendigo even more unsettling is the belief that those who fall victim to its curse transform into Wendigos themselves, driven to commit horrific acts of cannibalism. The creature’s power is amplified by the cold, desolate environments in which it is said to roam. As the legend goes, the more a person gives in to greed or self-interest, the more likely they are to invite the spirit into their soul, forever binding them to its endless hunger.

The Wendigo continues to be a source of fear and fascination, often appearing in stories, movies, and folklore, embodying the dark side of human nature and the consequences of unchecked desire.

activity_instructions: Imagine you need to write a formal warning letter to Clare, shown in the photo in her office attire. Write her a letter regarding her dress code violations. Ensure that you follow the correct structure and use appropriate formal language. Compare your answer to the model. This is a non-graded activity.
student_submission:
NTASIA – Background Information for Deploying Units

The situation in the Federation of Pantasia began to cause the international community concern a year ago when an election resulted in a vote to break up the federation and form two separate countries for its two main ethnic groups, the Alphas and the Betas. Fighting broke out for control of the mineral-rich Argos Region, as well as between certain minority groups who were made refugees. There is also evidence of an attempt at ethnic cleansing of a minority group.

Six months ago the military staged a coup to reunite the Federation. Although a large portion of the armed forces have returned to Federal control, elements have remained loyal to the new governments of Alpha and Beta. These armies have had small battles between themselves over disputed territories while resisting operations by the Federal forces based in Federal Territory.

Until a month ago the situation was a stalemate, however, the various factions have been rearming under the pretence of negotiations. Recently, strong leadership in Beta has resulted in a campaign that has pinned down Federal forces and Beta forces have also launched an all-out attack through Alpha territory to seize valuable land in Argos.

This has resulted in considerable civilian casualties, refugees and dislocation of population. There are reports of executions, rape, destruction of property and infrastructure. It is also believed that Beta has established concentration camps as part of its ethnic cleansing policy.

activity_instructions: Now write up the research proposal. Use the notes to help you. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
Work and Leisure Patterns in the USA

This proposal is a result of a government decision to collect information regarding work and leisure patterns in the general population. The research will be conducted on behalf of the U.S. Office of Sport and Leisure.

This research proposal will outline a plan to conduct quantitative research into contemporary leisure trends, work hours and social demands. Surveys and interviews will be conducted in order to evaluate the amount of time people spend engaged in work and leisure activities. Research of this size and scope is both necessary and timely since no similar work has been conducted in many years.

The research will analyze trends in leisure time over recent decades in the United States to determine whether the average amount of leisure time is changing. The aim of this research is to answer the following questions:

-    Does the current generation work longer hours than the previous generation?
-    How much time do people engage in leisure activities, and how do they spend their leisure time?
-    How much do people value their leisure time?

By conducting surveys with employers and those employed, and comparing this data with existing statistics, we will attempt to highlight the trends in leisure and work commitments.

Research methodology will focus on using surveys, interviews, sampling, data analysis and analytical comparisons. Limitations to this research include a maximum of three months for conducting research and data analysis. Material for this research will originate from research carried out in the past, as well as readily accessible government data.

The ultimate aim of this research is to shed light on current leisure and employment patterns and to add to the overall body of academic literature in the field of leisure studies.

activity_instructions: You're going to write about an interesting, fictional event that happened to a friend. Write your blog post. Type in the input box. Write 150-200 words.
student_submission:
A Serendipitous Encounter in the Mountains

Last weekend, my friend Alex had an unforgettable adventure while hiking in the Himalayas. Alex, an avid nature enthusiast, decided to explore a lesser-known trail near the village of Manali. The weather was perfect, with clear skies and a gentle breeze, making it an ideal day for a hike.

As Alex trekked deeper into the forest, they stumbled upon an old, abandoned cabin. Curiosity piqued, Alex decided to take a closer look. Inside, they found remnants of a bygone era—rusty tools, faded photographs, and a dusty journal. The journal belonged to a mountaineer named Raj, who had documented his expeditions in the region during the 1960s.

While reading Raj's entries, Alex discovered a map indicating a hidden waterfall nearby. Intrigued, they followed the map's directions and, after a challenging climb, reached the breathtaking waterfall. The sight was mesmerizing, with crystal-clear water cascading down the rocks, surrounded by lush greenery.

As Alex sat by the waterfall, they noticed a group of local villagers approaching. The villagers were delighted to see Alex and shared stories about Raj, who was a revered figure in their community. They even invited Alex to join their annual festival celebrating Raj's legacy.

Alex returned home with a heart full of memories and a newfound appreciation for the serendipity of exploration. This unexpected encounter not only enriched Alex's adventure but also connected them to the local culture and history in a profound way.
